type.description: The type of the tool. Always `image_generation`.

model.description: The image model to use for image generation.

quality.description: The quality setting for generated images.

size.description: The size of the generated image.

output_compression.description: Compression level for lossy output formats.

moderation.description: The moderation setting to apply to image generation.

background.description: The background setting for image generation.

input_image_mask.description: An optional mask image to apply when editing.

partial_images.description: The number of partial images to generate in streaming mode.

action.description: Whether to generate a new image or edit an existing image.
